page.title: 15Interview with a mother
page.content: Do you often use the park? Well,I don't use it but when I take the dog for a walk,we walk through the park and I watch the bowls or the tennis.The kids can play on the climbing frame.When I was small that park wasn't there.The rec used to have swings in but there isn't any now.We used to play but the swings got vandalised and the council took them out. Do you like the surroundings around your house? Well,I like where it is because it is not too busy with traffic and the kids can play out and you're not worried about them.It's pretty quiet.
